- You will find the full notebook with testing in the Notebook called "Lung Segmentation Using U-Net"
- The Model Weights available thrtough this link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/19KUa-iMQOXPAeDKTPLT9HVNjgdSHqMF6/view?usp=sharing

-to open the streamlit app:
	* Run the docker file to intsall the requirements and create the image and the container.
	* run the streamlit app and it should open the application..
	* upload an X-Ray chest image and it will print out the segmentation mask generated by the models.
